doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Duraisamy Chamil Selvam 2. Selliah Balakrishna 3. Irulan Adi Ganeshan 4. Duraisamy Manoharan 5. Selvaraj Sivashakthi Vs. The Attorney General before Hon. P. Kumararatnam, J.
